name: browser_wait_for
description: Wait for text to appear or disappear, or wait a specified time. Note: time is in SECONDS, not milliseconds.

time.description: Time to wait in SECONDS (e.g., 2 for 2 seconds, 0.5 for 500ms). Use for fixed delays.

text.description: Wait for this text to appear on the page.

textGone.description: Wait for this text to disappear from the page.

timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for text conditions in MILLISECONDS. Defaults to 30000 (30 seconds).

viewId.description: Target browser tab ID. If omitted, uses the last interacted tab.
